children.subject: I just emailed the head advisor about this, since my advisor didn't make me aware of this option. How long did the process take from start to finish?

It depends on how fast your advisor is, as all the work is on their side. AFAIK the deadline was Oct 31, but as your advisor was at fault for not making this clear to you, hopefully you might have admin on your favor. If you want to discuss this more, my email is jessica.yu@berkeley.edu.

I suggest communicating with your counselor immediately regarding transferring to L&S this semester. I was in your shoes last fall, also a ChemE major. There is a mechanism that allows first semester CoC students to transfer to L&S even though there is no recorded GPA yet. It is surprisingly hassle free, there is no letter of intent required on your side of the process.

history.content: Hi! I'm trying to enroll in EE16A as a ChemE. I currently can't enroll since I'm not L&S undeclared or EECS. I'm intending to transfer into the L&S (intending a CS major), but I can't do that until next semester. Is there anyway I can get off the waitlist considering I've already waived my ChemE requirements (which basically commits me to transferring)?
history.subject: Enrolling for EE16A as a CoC Major
